content: 3 step 4 then sl 16 16 16 17 17 17 18 18 each sleeve 8 8 8 9 9 9 10 10 10 10 18 18 sleeve sts from ln to rn as well then back 28 28 28 30 30 30 32 32 34 34 remove next marker and replace it with a new unique marker on rn different from all other raglan section 2 markers on needles - this is your new bor marker and represents the beg/end of round row 1 - raglan & neck increase row rs kfb in first st k1 kfb sm kfb *k to 1 st before marker kfb step 5 starting at this new bor marker at sm kfb repeat from * 2 more times then kfb again back left rejoin yarn and kfb *k to 1 st before in next st so you will have worked 2 kfb s back to marker kfb sm kfb repeat from * 1 more time back then k the last st - 2 sts increase d each front sleeve then k to end of right front and back step 6 then slide left front sts to end of needle row 2 ws p to end slipping markers as you tip and making sure sts aren t twisted continue reach them knitting across left front sts to 1 st before next marker this will join fronts together - don t worry if there is looseness at that joining point as this will be cinched up later kfb sm kfb k to 1 st before bor kfb www elizabethsmithknits com 2 you will now be working your garment in the round raglan section 5 next round k to bor slipping markers as you reach this section is for all sizes except xs them in this section round 1 will be your typical raglan increase round but on round 3 you ll only be working increase s on the front total sts and back no sleeve increase s front/back 38 38 38 40 40 40 42 42 44 44 each sleeve 18 18 18 19 19 19 20 20 20 20 round 1 *kfb k to 1 st before marker kfb sm repeat from * 3 more times - 2 sts increase d each front sleeve raglan section 4 and back round 2 k to end slipping markers as you reach round 1 *kfb k to 1 st before marker kfb sm repeat them from * 3 more times - 2 sts increase d each front sleeve and back round 3 - no sleeve increase s *kfb k to 1 st before marker kfb sm k to next marker sm repeat from * 1 round 2 k to end slipping markers as you reach more time - 2 sts increase d each front and back them round 4 k to end slipping markers as you reach repeat rnds 1-2 7 8 9 6 7 6 7 8 7 5 more them times* repeat rnds 1-4 x 0
